data.message: Pity ya couldn't give the same performance ya didn't do at Wembley in 2015 both me and my son big fans £105 a ticket each and was absolute rubbish the sound was crap and we complained to no avail booooo?!!?!!

replies.message: fok off mate
We were at Wembley too! Cost us a fortune and the sound quality was terrible! So disappointing. However, saw him last week in Glasgow and it was amazing!
Aimi Stewart If you're talking about sound quality its not Em's fault lol
Saw him at Wembley and had the time of my life. It is what you make of it. Saw him at Reading this weekend too and had the time of my life! So happy!
You know that if they had sound problems, it wasn't his fault right?
You don't realise how lucky you are to have seen him.
He was at wembely at 2014 actually. Was mint aswell 😂
Jake is your real name Stan? You sound like Stan...come to think about it, it's you 🤣
Aimi Stewart glad it wasn't just us nuff said we did make the Eminem camp aware and they just chose to take the money and run eh well there ya go #dontgiveafuck
Don't know can't remember the words
Was at glasgow i was lucky to be near the front the sound was amazing

If I remember right he did a few nights at Wembley. The first night which I was at was in the papers for having a lot of sound difficulties and people could barely make out what he was saying. I'm in no way saying its Eminem's fault! As i said, his gig in Glasgow was amazing!

I was at Wembley and in the centre sound was not great how's that his fault?
But to be honest at Leeds was right in the middle could not move 
Sound visual and he played more then I expected I'd say it was 
A much better set them Wembley but it did not take 3hrs to get out
Different venue differant sound mate
He was fucking awful at reading a few years back to But was suppose to be great last weekend! Pissed
//jake//https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rJ6WodM8Uis
Watched him in 2013 at Leeds and yesterday both was fuckin top shows guy never fails to disappoint

Sounded awesome at Leeds this weekend. Im an Eminem veteran,  4th time seeing  him, Milton Keynes 2003 was crazy, Reading 2013 was awesome, Wembley 2014 was great to hear new tracks other than sound quality and leeds 2017 was great, my only quibble as a fan is it would be nice to hear some new stuff other that practicality the same set at 3 events but still sounds great live everytime #Eminemfanforlife 
Trump  is dangerous, leave North Korea alone #Fecktrump
#Don't fuck with shady
You go the "real slim shady Stan" treatment. I thought thats what you pay for lololololol
Ben Taylor Mike Coombes Will Fitz not just us then
You bring your children to see eminem?
Lyrical genius
I Call Shady "the Mighty"
